work.name: Convergence Business Systems
work.summary: Python, Data Warehousing, Clickhouse, Freeswitch, Asterisk, linux, graffana, AWS Cloud, MySQL, Redis
highlights: Maintained and refactored legacy code, ensuring stability, performance improvements, and smooth transitions to modern technologies.
Led the deployment of a Telecom Helpline Call Center solution, enhancing customer-agent interactions and creating a performance monitoring module for operational efficiency.
Managed company servers, ensuring uptime, security, and scalability while automating tasks for enhanced operational efficiency.

work.name: Convergence Business Systems

highlights: Developed a highly efficient ETL pipeline, consolidating data into a 60TB Data Lake, significantly enhancing query speed and empowering the sales team with real-time insights.
Implemented automation solutions for server maintenance, including real-time alerts and automated client reports, improving system reliability and client satisfaction.

volunteer.summary: We aim to connect CS students across Pakistan and mentor them to bridge the academia-industry gap by offering mentorship, skill-building workshops, career guidance, and more.

Volunteered with Mr. Qaiser Ahmed Raja to create a dedicated messaging platform for 'The Revivalists' community, addressing issues with WhatsApp bans and reports. Used open-source Element Messenger to build the platform. Assisted in deploying the Synapse backend server for seamless communication.
Overseeing Official Media Team and helping the community grow their online presence.

awards.title: Gold Medal
